allow:
Bash(bash -c '
STRAPI_URL=""https://peaceful-insight-production.up.railway.app""
TOKEN=""9ff727d730447da883cad384524bc2e9891de14e526d0273c0785710762dc0ef2aa6900a855948e3fa6ed72a1927178b6c725fa34605959aac8cb69794463c1484cd0325548fc3a5c88898cb9099ac114e40c19bb6755c8d2f7d9110330be97031587152e34f6e37992eb31faef66c92f60df20b32b80b95029744047504f9f9""

echo ""================================================================""
echo ""STRAPI DEPLOYMENT DIAGNOSTICS""  
echo ""================================================================""
echo """"

echo ""[1/5] Health Check:""
curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""  Status: %{http_code}\\n"" ""$STRAPI_URL/_health""

echo """"
echo ""[2/5] Authors API:""
curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""  Status: %{http_code}\\n"" ""$STRAPI_URL/api/authors"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN""

echo """"
echo ""[3/5] Blog Posts API:""
curl -s -o /dev/null -w ""  Status: %{http_code}\\n"" ""$STRAPI_URL/api/blog-posts"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN""

echo """"
echo ""[4/5] Blog Post Schema Check:""
RESPONSE=$\(curl -s ""$STRAPI_URL/api/blog-posts?pagination%5Blimit%5D=1"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN""\)
if echo ""$RESPONSE"" | grep -q ""\\""excerpt\\""""; then
    echo ""  ✓ NEW schema \(has excerpt field\)""
elif echo ""$RESPONSE"" | grep -q ""\\""Content\\""""; then
    echo ""  ✗ OLD schema \(still has Content field\)""
else
    echo ""  ? Unknown schema""
fi

echo """"
echo ""[5/5] Local Files:""
echo ""  Author schema exists:"" && ls -la src/api/author/content-types/author/schema.json 2>/dev/null | grep schema.json && echo ""  ✓ Yes"" || echo ""  ✗ No""
')
Bash(__NEW_LINE_4420bff47f65d744__ echo "=== Testing Admin API Access ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_793b6ed47309ee4e__ echo "=== GETTING CURRENT BLOG POST SCHEMA ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_009f586c01c78a7a__ echo "=== ADDING TLDR, FAQ, AUTHOR RELATION ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_d0c0d8d4c4520f62__ echo "=== ADDING TLDR AND FAQ COMPONENTS ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_798f5b027d1ea086__ echo "=== ADDING TLDR AND FAQ TO BLOG POST ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_f5288296898e7bd8__ echo "=== CHECKING IF AUTHOR IS NOW AVAILABLE AS TARGET ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_0dd926f58e69c9f1__ echo "=== ADDING AUTHOR RELATION TO BLOG POST ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_e5fa757597de9af2__ echo "=== ADDING SEO FIELDS \(WITHOUT AUTHOR\) ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_a1ef6cb22635e4c7__ echo "=== BLOG POST SCHEMA CHECK ===")
